Committee: Commerce, Economic Development And Small Business

Milestones.Committee: Commerce, Economic Development And Small Business

Actions.Text: REFERRED TO COMMERCE, ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT AND SMALL BUSINESS
REFERRED TO COMMERCE, ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT AND SMALL BUSINESS

Title: Makes provisions relating to assisting small businesses
Summary: Allows for the division for small-business to advise on matters affecting micro-enterprises consisting of fewer than five employees; establishes the main street center grant program to create main street centers in each of the counties in New York state, with the exception of the five boroughs of New York city; and requires the secretary of state to receive all rule-making documents in electronic format and to create an online publication of the state register.
LawCode: Amd §134, Ec Dev L; add §16-bb, UDC Act; add §§102-a & 149-a, Exec L; amd §202, St Ad Proc Act
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the economic development law, the New York state urban development corporation act, the executive law and the state administrative procedure act, in relation to assisting small businesses in this state
